Evening express - 1904-03-14
Began with issue for: No. 1 (8 Apr. 1887). Ended with issue for: No. 4671 (23 June 1902).
Description based on issue for: No. 1195 (1 Apr. 1891).
Cyhoeddwyd ac argraffwyd yn Caerdydd gan Walter Alfred Pearce.
Published and printed in Cardiff by Walter Alfred Pearce.
From 1902 continued as: Evening express and evening mail.

Papur newydd dyddiol oedd â thueddiadau ceidwadol. Fe'i cyhoeddwyd yn Saesneg yn bennaf. Cofnodai newyddion lleol a chyffredinol. Cylchredwyd yng Nghaerdydd a'r cyffiniau. Teitlau cysylltiol: Evening Express and Evening Mail (1902-1917).

A daily English language newspaper, supportive of conservative politics and which circulated in the district of Cardiff. The newspaper's main content included local and general news. Associated titles: Evening Express and Evening Mail (1902-1917).
/9200385/BibliographicResource_3000117416203
